Articles.Content:
True. At least I think I am. Though I might be in the matrix. Or a robot programmed to think it's a person. I can't be sure.

The user below me has fewer than 3 PCs in their home.

What about exactly three?

The person below me speaks French.

Hell no!

The user below me was in some slavic country for holidays.

Yeah, in Ukraine visiting my folks' folks & uncles xD

The user below me owns a house.

True. Nothing like your own castle.

The user below me lives in an apartment.

yes with my family cause im still a year away from graduating high school.However location I live in is certainly not safe.

User below me has an interest in steam powered technology.

Partially true. I wouldnt however steam-ize the world.

The user below me talked with Cleverbot.

yup.

The user below me has read a book in less than a day.

Yep. A 300 page book, A5, in 2 hours.

The user below me knows about ksprp.

Nope, sorry.

The user below me became cross-eyed, his height starts decreasing, head starts morphing into a jar shape and his skin is gradually turning green.

Nope, sorry.

The user below me became cross-eyed, his height starts decreasing, head starts morphing into a jar shape and his skin is gradually turning green.

False, but these fish scales on my leg weren't there before....

The user below me should technically be asleep right now.

Also, where is your avatar pic from? It reminds me of Olimar's spaceship from the first Pikmin.

Edited June 30, 2014 by Tw1

Already cross eyed. But nope.

The user below me their name is the same as mine - Jacob.

False.

User below me is a walking panadol.

false as i don't treat pain

the user below me also keeps track of multiple mods at once through many opened tabs

Wut? Umm i think no?

The user below me comes from a slavic country.

Yeah, from Ukraine.

Also, where is your avatar pic from? It reminds me of Olimar's spaceship from the first Pikmin.

Actually it's from final mission of Metal Slug 3

English isn't the below user's native lingo.

Edited July 1, 2014 by Overfloater

False I am a North Carolinian.

The user below me has a laptop.

true, i own a few gaming drivin' world record before record start being recorded.

the user below me can't keep an array secret'ly.

Umm...? A solar array? Or what? I think i can...

The user below me lives in a small country (by small i mean smaller than Czech or Austria)

Nope love in the United States.

The user below me knows a good pun.

True. You asked for it.

The user below me did not laugh at that pun, even though they got it.

true wait they were being grinded up by the mills right, if not then false

the user below me watched the world cup today

false, i can't stand any too much over sponsored kind of sport contest anymore

the user below me launched the handi-football world cup and will be remembered

False. i dont even watch football.

The User below me uses mods.

True, I have around 40.

The user below me likes making VTOL's.
